thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 4 of 227
thread.title: Carmen Fluker
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Carmen Fluker

author: Carmen Fluker
title: Carmen Fluker
text: I came to Gardner White after another company gave me the worst possible service. I knew I didn't have top tier credit, but that is no excuse for a humiliating experience. I applied for financing with Gardner White and hit an answer right away. When I went into the store the salesman was so nice and stuck with me through the process of finding a bed. In less than 48 hours I had my financed bed set up in my house. I would definitely go back to Gardner White for all of my furniture needs.
